comments:
Create XML file with the following:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<tag>
      <BillTo
            name="Milton McGoo"
            phone="416-448-4414">
      </BillTo>
</tag>

place cursor after the " on McGoo and hit the delete key to delete a space and move the phone attribute up to the same line

**Notice you now get an error saying the name attribute is missing closing quote.  Notice the red squiggly is also not underlining the last 'o"'

Format document.

**Notice the last 'o"' was deleted.

If I undo format and then Format again, everything's fine.

However, if I Revert and perform the same steps, I get the same problems.

Also, If instead of formatting, I perform Cleanup document, and make sure I have quote attribute values checked, I end up with:
name="Milton McGo"o="o""		phone="416-448-4414">

And I get the following exception in the log:
